\documentclass{standalone}
\usepackage{tikz}
\begin{document}
\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=0.3]
\draw[help lines] (-0.1,-0.1) grid (2.1,3.1);

\usetikzlibrary{arrows.meta}
\draw[>.>->.>>] (0,2) -- +(2,1);
\draw[{Stealth[right]}-{Stealth[left]}] (0,1) -- +(2,1);
\draw[-{Bracket[reversed]}] (0,0) -- +(2,1);

\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
